Routine Descriptions

RBSP_EFW_PHASEF_READ_ANGLE_SPINPLANE_BO

 [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Read the angles between Bx mGSE and y and z axes in deg.
 Save to rbspx_angle_spinplane_Bo.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/efw_flag/rbsp_efw_phasef_read_angle_spinplane_bo.pro)

RBSP_EFW_PHASEF_READ_AUTOBIAS_FLAG

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Read autobias flag.

 time. The time range in unix time.
 probe=. 'a' or 'b'.
 local_root=. The local root directory for saving rbsp data.
 remote_root=. The URL for grabing rbsp data.
 version=. Default is 'v01'.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/efw_flag/rbsp_efw_phasef_read_autobias_flag.pro)

RBSP_EFW_PHASEF_READ_AUTOBIAS_FLAG_GEN_FILE

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Generate daily flag for autobias.

 AutoBias starts actively controlling the bias currents at V12 = -1.0 V,
 ramping down the magnitude of the bias current so that when V12 = 0.0 V,
 the bias current is very near to zero after starting out around -20
 nA/sensor.

 For V12 > 0.0 V, the bias current continues to increase (become more
 positive), although at a slower rate, 0.2 nA/V or something like that.

 Auto Bias flag values. From 'rbsp?_efw_hsk_idpu_fast_TBD'
 Bit   Value   Meaning
 3     8       Toggles off and on every other cycle when AutoBias is active.
 2     4       One when AutoBias is controlling the bias, Zero when AutoBias is not controlling the bias.
 1     2       One when BIAS3 and BIAS4 can be controlled by AUtoBias, zero otherwise.
 0     1       One when BIAS1 and BIAS2 can be controlled by AUtoBias,	zero otherwise.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/efw_flag/rbsp_efw_phasef_read_autobias_flag_gen_file.pro)

RBSP_EFW_PHASEF_READ_DIAGBRATIO

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Read the ratios of By/Bx and Bz/Bx in mGSE.
 Save to rbspx_diagBratio.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/efw_flag/rbsp_efw_phasef_read_diagbratio.pro)

RBSP_EFW_PHASEF_READ_FLAG_20

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Get the 20-element flag_all for a certain boom pair.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/efw_flag/rbsp_efw_phasef_read_flag_20.pro)

RBSP_EFW_PHASEF_READ_FLAG_25

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Get the 25-element flag_all for a certain boom pair.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/efw_flag/rbsp_efw_phasef_read_flag_25.pro)

RBSP_EFW_PHASEF_READ_WAKE_FLAG_GEN_FILE

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Apply wake effect correction to e_uvw.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/efw_flag/rbsp_efw_phasef_read_wake_flag_gen_file.pro)

RBSP_EFW_READ_BOOM_FLAG

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Read RBSP boom flag, where 1 is for working boom.

 time. A time or a time range in ut time. Set time to find files
   automatically, or set files to read data in them directly.
 id=. A string sets the data type to read. Check supported ids by setting
   print_datatype.
 print_datatype=. A boolean. Set to print all supported ids.
 probe=. A string set the probe to read data for.
 local_root=. A string to set the local root directory.
 remote_root=. A string to set the remote root directory.
 version=. A string to set specific version of files. By default, the
   program finds the files of the highest version.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/efw_flag/rbsp_efw_read_boom_flag.pro)

RBSP_EFW_READ_FLAGS

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Read all efw flags.

 time. The time range in unix time.
 probe=. 'a' or 'b'.
 local_root=. The local root directory for saving rbsp data.
 remote_root=. The URL for grabing rbsp data.
 version=. Default is 'v01'.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/efw_flag/rbsp_efw_read_flags.pro)

RBSP_EFW_READ_FLAGS_GEN_FILE

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Read all flags for all boom_pairs.
 Adopted from rbsp_efw_get_flag_values.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/efw_flag/rbsp_efw_read_flags_gen_file.pro)

RBSP_GEN_AUTOBIAS_FLAG

 [Previous Routine] [List of Routines] 
 Generate daily flag for autobias.

 AutoBias starts actively controlling the bias currents at V12 = -1.0 V,
 ramping down the magnitude of the bias current so that when V12 = 0.0 V,
 the bias current is very near to zero after starting out around -20
 nA/sensor.

 For V12 > 0.0 V, the bias current continues to increase (become more
 positive), although at a slower rate, 0.2 nA/V or something like that.

 Auto Bias flag values. From 'rbsp?_efw_hsk_idpu_fast_TBD'
 Bit   Value   Meaning
 3     8       Toggles off and on every other cycle when AutoBias is active.
 2     4       One when AutoBias is controlling the bias, Zero when AutoBias is not controlling the bias.
 1     2       One when BIAS3 and BIAS4 can be controlled by AUtoBias, zero otherwise.
 0     1       One when BIAS1 and BIAS2 can be controlled by AUtoBias,	zero otherwise.

(See general/missions/rbsp/efw/rbsp_phasef/efw_flag/rbsp_gen_autobias_flag.pro)
